reviewText: Great DVD since so many episodes on one disc. My 3 yr. old grandson will sit still and watch the entire disc. He knows all the characters names. He can watch this in the car. Very colorful. One of the best cartoons Disney Jr. offers!

I got this for my 3year old because he started being afraid of monsters. The Huggelmonster family is really cute, and my three yer old has stopped being scared of monsters.
It includes the following episodes:
1. The Huggelflower/ Monster Lullaby
2. Astrobrix/ The Sore Roar
3. Promises Promises/ Fireworks Night
4. The Hugglejuice Stand/ The Huggeldance Party
5. Carried Away/ Monster in Charge
6. Monsterpet Pageant/ Ivor's First Stomp
And Sheriff Callie's Wild West.
Over 2 hours of Henry.
My son is a huge Henry fan so he loves to put this in the player in our daily 1 1/2 commute.
It would be nice that all the ones I see on Disney Jr. were available for sale. It is great for my 2 year old

This DVD contains six episodes from the Henry Hugglemonster Disney Junior Cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. The Huggleflower / Monster Lullaby
2. Astrobrix / The Sore Roar
3. Promises, Promises / Fireworks Night
4. The Hugglejuice Stand / The Huggledance Party
5. Carried Away / Monster In Charge
6. Monsterpet Pageant / Ivor's First Stomp

There is also a Bonus Episode from the new Disney Junior cartoon Sheriff Callie's Wild West called "Horseshoe Peck / Callie's Gold Nugget".
We love Henry and his whole Hugglemonster family! Great show that really grabs my sons attention. Henry Hugglemonster allows me to get things done around the house.

My kids have loved this show since it aired on Disney Jr so they were thrilled to watch Henry Hugglemonster: Meet the Hugglemonster on DVD. Its one of my magic shows as I call them. If I need to get something done and want to make sure my kids are glued to the TV, this is a show I put on!

Henry Hugglemonster and his adorable monster family and friends give monsters a good name! This was something we really needed at a time where my kids started to think there were monsters in their room at night. Now they have a friendly view of monsters instead of a  scary one and it took the stigma out of scary right out of the word monster in our house!

This DVD has six of the original episodes so even though my kids had seen most of them on TV multiple times, they still want to watch the DVD over and over and over and. There is also a bonus episode that they hadnt seen and loved.

As a fun little bonus, this comes with iron on decals. Weve actually never used them before so this was a fun little thing to do with them that was new and different and they thought was the coolest thing ever!

At just over two hours, my kids can watch this whole DVD and it buys me enough time to get things done distraction free. Or if its bedtime and they get one last show, I can just select one episode from the menu instead of playing all.

Disney Jr is a name I trust and my kids are allowed to watch anything on this channel and I don't have to worry about sitting and watching with them every time. Henry Hugglemonster is another smash hit and this DVD is sure to be as well.
No problems at all. Item was exactly as described, was delivered exactly when it was supposed to be delivered, and I am satisfied exactly as much as I hoped to be!
Grandson loves his huggle monster movie
My 2 Girls love it!!!
Kids love it 4 yr olds
This is a gift I am shore he will like it

Henry Hugglemonster: Meet the Hugglemonsters is a 2014 Disney DVD compilation with six episodes of the new Disney Junior animated series, plus a bonus, unaired episode of the brand-new Disney Junior animated series, Sheriff Callie's Wild West! In Meet the Hugglemonsters, five-year-old Henry Hugglemonster and his family and friends engaged in various fun and learning adventures right in their hometown of Roarsville, where every monster is friendly. And in Sheriff Callie's Wild West, Sheriff Callie(Mandy Moore, Rapunzel from Tangled)keeps the peace in the Western town of Nice-and-Friendly Corners, as she and her deputies, Peck and Toby help out their neighbours in every situation. In addition to the Sheriff Callie episode, the bonus features includes sneak peeks of other Disney favourites like Tinker Bell and the Pirate Fairy, The Jungle Book DVD release and promos for the Disney Junior Appisodes. Henry Hugglemonster: Meet the Hugglemonsters is the perfect Disney DVD for fans of Henry Hugglemonster and Sheriff Callie!
my 5 year old watches it often!

My four year old daughyer LOVES this show. an the 2 bonus epasodes of sherriff callies wild west. its apropriet an fun! Reminds ke of doc mcstuffins because you would think it was created by the same people. i love it!
Excellent my kid loves it
Great entertainment for the little guys.  It keeps them entertained.  My grandson just loves this DVD.  I would like to purchase more DVD's like this one.
My 19 month old absolutely loves this cartoon it makes every day better. She just laughs and smiles through every episode.

This video was used but looked new.  The Disney Movie Rewards code was still in video case.  The video was received much earlier than projected.  My daughter loves it and it looks new both the disc and case.  I will order from this company again based on all the above.

The monster's land is called Roarsville.  5 year old Henry Hugglemonster lives here, and plays and learns something roarsome everyday.  With his family, and a cuddly monster town, he has the joys and challenges of growing up.  He's a helper, sets up a juggle juice stand, enters his monster dog Beckett in a pageant.  This movie will make your preschooler roar!
So glad we could find a DVD for Henry Hugglemonster.  Wish there would be more toys or DVDs or figurines for HH
Bought it for my 4 year old grandson and he loves it!!  He said it is just like the television show.

my 2 year old loves this cartoon. i can slip this in the car dvd player and it keeps him occupied for hours. got item very fast and at a good price. will buy the next one on dvd when it gets released. thanks again amazon!

I thoight this would be whole first season but it's only half of first season.  So it's a bit pricey.  You can get entire first season for $15 or $2 an episode on Amazon Instant!  It is good to have available for car rides and travel etc where Amazon not available but I can't wait for ENTIRE DVD to come out.  :-/

I am a fan of Henry Hugglemonster since I have a nephew and my late father who bears the name Henry. Also, it is a huggletastic and cute show to watch, because it keeps you entertained. He is a roartastic little monster as well as the rest of Roarsville. Would recommend Henry Hugglemonster to anyone who just loves the show or looking for a way to entertain their children. :-) I ordered this DVD from CD Warehouse, they are an excellent vendor.
My son and niece are huge fans of Henry Hugglemonster so this was the perfect gift for my niece's birthday coming up shortly.
Henry Hugglemonster is one, if not the most, favorite characters on Disney Ju ior. This certainly fits the bill for her huggle-tainment. As Henry would say, it's roarsome.
A+
